sentences.sContent: It is no surprise that she could saddle the horses.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is no surprise that she could saddle the horses.
sentences.sCn: 她能给马备鞍并没有什么值得惊讶的。

sentences.sContent: Thee bike's frame, wheels, handlebars and saddle are all made of cardboard in this way, and then fitted together.
sentences.sContent_eng: Thee bike's frame, wheels, handlebars and saddle are all made of cardboard in this way, and then fitted together.
sentences.sCn: 自行车的车架、车轮、车把和车座都用以此方式制造的纸板制成，然后组装在一起。

synos.tran: 鞍，鞍状物；[车辆]车座；拖具

remMethod.val: 骑马上鞍(saddle)， 划船用桨(paddle)

words.tran: 马具商，制造马鞍的人；乘坐用的马

trans.tranOther: a leather seat that you sit on when you ride a horse
to put a saddle on a horse
